"type".id left join lily."group" ownerGroup on a.gid = ownerGroup.id left join art proto on a.proto = proto.id left join artphase phase on a.phase = phase.id left join lily.uom uom on a.uom = uom.id left join lily."user" ownerUser on a.uid = ownerUser.id left join artcat category on a.cat = category.id

mapper.insert: insert into art( sku, barcode, rfid, uid, gid, mode, acl, label, description, icon, priority, flags, "state", creation, lastmod, "version", model, proto, "type", cat, phase, uom, props, finish, price ) values( #{skuCode}, #{barCode}, #{rfidCode}, #{ownerUserId}, #{ownerGroupId}, #{accessMode}, #{acl}, #{label}, #{description}, #{icon}, #{priority}, #{flags}, #{state}, #{creationDate}, #{lastModified}, #{version}, #{modelName}, #{protoId}, #{typeId}, #{categoryId}, #{phaseId}, #{uomId}, #{properties}, #{finish}, #{price} );
